COBRApy
=======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which COBRApy installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using COBRApy, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load COBRApy/0.29.0-foss-2023b
```
